articles.title: Apple made the top 5 best-selling smartphones of 2021, Galaxy A12 came in at number 6 - XDA Developers
articles.description: Apple dominated the best-selling smartphones list in 2021, capturing seven of the ten spots. Galaxy A12 was the best-selling Android phone.
